instant t2 in which one VCORin of the first and second input components VCORin VQUADin assumes a first zero value and in which the other VQUADin of said first and second input components VCORin and second input components VCORin VQUADin differing at said first instant t2 from a corresponding first ideal value said first ideal value being a function of said nonzero value and of a steadystate gain value equal to the gain of said electronic circuit when the first switch RESET1 and the first coupling circuit RD1 RD2 operate in the respectivesecond operating mode and wherein the first coupling circuit RD1 RD2 is configured to carry out a switching from the respective first operating mode to the respective second operating mode in a way synchronous with a second instant t3 which is at a distance in time from the first instant t2 that is half of said period and in which said one VCORin of the first and second input components VCORin VQUADin assumes a second zero value in such a
